Class com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaFolder 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaObject
           |
           +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaFolder
public class KawaFolder
extends KawaObject
This object represents a KawaFolder or a folder within a Kawa project. There is no need to instantiate this object. Kawa will instantiate this for you. A KawaFolder can be acquired by:
  1. Calling KawaFolder.enumerateFolders() and going through the list of folders.
  2. Calling KawaProject.enumerateFolders() and going through the list of folders.

KawaFolder(String, String, String)
Restricted constructor.

enumerateAllFiles()
Returns an enumeration of all the files under this folder.
enumerateFolders()
Returns an enumeration of all the folders in the this folder.
enumerateRootFiles()
Returns an enumeration of all the root files in this folder.
getName()
Returns the name of the folder.
getParent()
Returns the name of the parent folder.
getPath()
Returns the path of the assosiated project.
rebuildFolder()
Rebuilds the cuurent folder.
toString()
Returns the name of the folder.
